n: Creamy Maple Dip For Sweet Potato Fries
des: "I got this super-easy recipe from a restaurant back in the 90s. It is a must-have whenever I serve sweet potato fries. Plain Greek yogurt and sugar-free syrup can be substituted to make it lighter. Feel free to adjust the amount of ingredients depending on your tastes. Hope you enjoy!"
ins: Mix mayonnaise with maple syrup in a bowl until thoroughly combined.
